body_html:
Building the branch r1.0 from source gives me the same warning. I'm working on Gentoo with GCC 4.9.4.

The command is:

$ bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Thanks

body:
Building the branch r1.0 from source gives me the same warning. I'm working on Gentoo with GCC 4.9.4. 

The command is: 

`$ bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package `
